actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit union organization of, and collective bargaining on behalf of, members of the Armed Forces and to amend the Uniform Code of Military Justice to prohibit union organizing, union membership, and collective bargaining by members of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any individual or entity to solicit to enroll or enroll any member of the armed forces in any labor organization or for any member of the armed forces to form, join, or encourage others to join any labor organization. Sets forth penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit union organization of, and collective bargaining on behalf of, members of the Armed Forces and to amend the Uniform Code of Military Justice to prohibit union organizing, union membership, and collective bargaining by members of the Armed Forces.
